trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AssemblyLoadEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.AssemblyLoadEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad" /> de um <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> is used to specify the methods that are invoked in response to an <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> é usado para especificar os métodos que são invocados em resposta a um <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad> eventos.

trans-unit.source: To associate an instance of <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> with an event, add the instance to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar uma instância de <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> com um evento, adicione a instância para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The methods referenced by the <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> are invoked whenever an assembly is loaded, until the <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> is removed from the event.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos referenciados pelo <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> são invocados sempre que um assembly é carregado, até que o <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> é removido do evento.
